name: Kevin Yen (yen.118)
tagline: A Computer Science master student at The Ohio State University
body:
## About me
I'm a Computer Science master student at The Ohio State University, currently working with professor [Hen-wei Shen](http://web.cse.ohio-state.edu/~hwshen) on Visualization related projects. Was working with [Yifan Hu](http://yifanhu.net/) at Yahoo Research on a application for analyzing and visualizing data fetched from Hive. Interested in Visualization and Human-Computer Interaction.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
